about_the_game:
DAYDREAMER is an action-adventure RPG game where you explore your daydreams as an adventurer warping between worlds. Explore rich environments, move between classes, hang out with friends when the bells eventually ring to snap you back to reality, and always be ready for adventure! What stories will your head come up with?

- Daydreamer will be released in early access, all features below are planned to be released in due time as we at Underground-Games continue to develop DAYDREAMER

Key Features:

  • 7 different Dream Worlds full of quests, wonders, adventures, and possibly even secrets!
  • Unique shop style, where you must buy or upgrade equipment at the beginning of your adventure day.
  • Weapon upgrade system where you can improve your weapons along with you!
  • Simple skill tree, have one passive ability for each dream world, and four active abilities that could give you an edge in your quests or boss fights!
  • Interactive NPC's to help build the world. Each dream world has different styles of people! And don't forget about your classmates at school!
  • Small character creator to help you feel more like "You"!
  • Boss fights! Any good adventure needs a boss to fight, test the skills you have learned, and put your play style to the test! Just don't run out of lives!
  • Multiple endings depending on how well you do in school! Remember, you're still in high school. Grades are important, right?
  • Difficulties to help make the game the proper challenge level for you, from the day-to-day casual player to the hardcore gamer who wants a hard challenge. Maybe you'll try the secret difficulty? The choice is yours!

name: DAYDREAMER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Daydreamer: An action-adventure RPG game where you dream away your classes to explore an action-packed world of adventure made from the topics surrounding you. Your brain is the limit! So go and have fun!
